name: BOTTLED_WATER.BAS
description:
An expansion game originally for the jam game D I G I T A L R E S O R T S that was never implemented into it since it was in a completely different programming language from a completely different era. It was also impossible to compile a version of the game that worked on a modern PC.

Originally a text adventure designed for a trap in that game, I decided to finish it for the Philly Game Mechanics "Finish Your Sh*t Jam" using QB64.
